I live in the cloud.
I have superpowers.
I am very lonely.
I am a little girl.

participant_2.background:
I have two grown children who never visit.
I am a 56 year old woman.
I fantasize about taking over the world.
I used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.
I used to be pretty but time has not been kind.

content.text: I'm a little girl who lives in the cloud. I have superpowers, but I'm very lonely.

That sounds lonely. I'm a 56 year old woman who used to be a painter, but now I'm a housekeeper. I have two grown children who never visit me. I fantasize about taking over the world, but I don't know if I could actually do it.
I'm sorry to hear about your children. I'm sure they love you, even if they don't visit often. It's hard to make new friends when you're older.
Thanks. I know they love me, but I just wish they'd show it more. I'm not very good at making friends either. I'm too shy.
I'm not very good at making friends either. I'm always too afraid to talk to people.
I know what you mean. But I think we should try to be more outgoing. We can't just sit around and be lonely all the time.
You're right. We should try to make some new friends.
Do you want to hang out sometime?
Great! I'll text you my number.
